summary:
Marvel’s women are cool af and nobody could convince me otherwise. I mean l00k at the evidence; 
Peggy Carter, Pepper Potts,...
body:
Marvel’s women are cool af and nobody could convince me otherwise. I mean l00k at the evidence;

  • Peggy Carter, Pepper Potts, Betty Ross, Natasha Romanoff, Maria Hill, Jane Foster, Gamora, Mantis, Wanda Maximoff, Helen Cho, Laura Barton, Hope Van Dyne, Ancient One, Christine Palmer, May Parker, MJ, Shuri, Okoye, Nakia, Valkyrie, Lady Sif

Even the female villains in Marvel kickass;

  • Maya Hansen, Nebula, Hela, Ava/Ghost

And if these weren’t enough, look at the tv series of Marvel;

  • Melinda May, Skye, Jemma Simmons, Victoria Hand, Yo-Yo Rodriguez (to name a few)

So ya, basically the reason why I prefer Marvel to any other movies because they recognise the power a woman hold and they don’t make them into some damsel in distress in every single movie. Instead the women in this franchise fight alongside men, become a hero/villain, save the day, protect the other idiots, put up with the boys’ shenanigans, and are usually the ones with common sense

title: Koschei
body:
“It was beautiful. Like nothing I’ve ever seen before. It was like an everlasting sunset on a plane of nothingness.” - Ava Collins

Apologia

I put the retro-reflective panels on and land the quinjet in the woods outside of Madrid. We send Sam into the city with a list of stuff to get.LIST:Hair BleachTonerScissorsHairbrushmirrorCell…

Read more…

me:

tags: imagine peter when he finds out
omg i love you mr stark
body:
OMG WTH DID I THINK

So I noticed a trend where captain America drops his shield without hesitation when he can’t use it. I thought it was because he knows he doesn’t need to the suit to be captain America. And tony knows this so he tries to get Peter to be more than just a suit. But he wants Peter to be more like him than cap— although he’s using cap as a good example since he isn’t.

blog.name: dreamerforeternity
blog.title: Who I am, is not who I want to be
blog.description: In this world of today, with 8 billion people, I wish to be special. Although deep in my heart, I know I'm not and never will be. I just want to, one day, accept that fact and live my life, content with its small diameter. But I do know, whatever happens, happens for the good. There are no mistakes or coincidences in this world. It's all planned to the tee by faith. Thats what I believe in, fate. Even if the world can be explained by science, magic still lies underneath. Ask me how. I'll tell you. On those precious days when the sky gets tainted with all 7 beautiful colours of life it look magical. But a rainbow is only formed when light is passed through tiny water droplets. We all know about the process of dispersion. To be precise, different spectrums of light have different speeds in different mediums. thus they appear in individual colours. They have different speed's because they have different frequencies. But science still cannot explain exactly why different rays of colours have different frequencies. Thus, anything unexplainable is magic. If you get down to the root of things, the raw nature of it is natural, made by god, unexplainable or in my words...magical. similarly, in my eyes, this world is magical too.

summary:
3 bars of chocolate and 6 kids 
Tony: Get 3 more chocolates.
Steve: Let them all have equal shares.
Clint: Just pick 3 of...
body:
3 bars of chocolate and 6 kids

Tony: Get 3 more chocolates.

Steve: Let them all have equal shares.

Clint: Just pick 3 of them.

Natasha: …I am not taking part in this.

Thor: WE MUST BUY 12 MORE!!! 2 FOR EACH!!

Bruce: If you can’t give to all then don’t give to any.

Peter p.: …can I have one please?

Fury: Let those motherfuckers compete for it!

Tony: language!

Steve: …*sigh*

summary: How do the Avengers possibly defeat a crew of 2,000-foot-tall, nearly omnipotent Dark Celestials bent on annihilating the human...
body:
How do the Avengers possibly defeat a crew of 2,000-foot-tall, nearly omnipotent Dark Celestials bent on annihilating the human race? While Thor and Hulk search for answers deep within the bowels of Old Asgard, we learn more about the untold history of Odin and his Prehistoric Avengers!

summary: Summary: You are hired to be Steve's new assistant at the new Avengers facility. As you get to know the super soldier, Bucky...
body:
Capsizing Pt 3 ❤️💙

Summary: You are hired to be Steve’s new assistant at the new Avengers facility. As you get to know the super soldier, Bucky points out your obvious crush on Steve and helps him admit his as well.

Pairings: Steve x Reader, Bucky x Reader (fake) later on

Warnings: fluff, just a bit of language, Steve being a teasing little shit

Word count: 523 words

A/N: i am so incredibly sorry this was so late!! I’m going to try to be quicker with updates ❤️ pt 4??

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

“And here we have the pool. That concludes our tour of the compound, any questions?” I look up at a smiling Steve, still in his workout clothes.

“That’ll be it, thanks for the tour. Now I won’t get too lost,” I say, smiling. I quickly check my watch. Noticing it says 7:00, I bid Steve goodbye and walk to the elevator.

The elevator arrives at floor 1, and I walk down the hall into the kitchen. Vision and Wanda Maximoff are casually talking at the table, and Bucky is leaning on the counter drinking coffee. He looks up, and I walk to him. “You’re early. I love it,” he says, not too loud. “Why don’t we go to my room, it will be a little more private.” I nod, and follow him back the elevator.

We reach floor 3, and I run a little to keep up with Bucky’s long strides. He opens his room, and holds the door open for me as I walk inside. I look around the large room, noticing how different it is from Steve’s. Both are spacious and huge, but Steve’s looked smaller because of all the clutter around the room. “So, you like Steve?”

I look up quickly at Bucky, who is smirking from across the room at me. “We’ve already established that, yes,” I mutter, my cheeks turning bright red immediately. “Why do you care so much?”

“Because from the way that man was looking at you, he’s probably feeling the same way,” Bucky says, chuckling lightly as he sits on his bed.

My eyes widen immediately, but I quickly come to my senses and shake my head. “I can’t. He can’t, I work for him. That’s incredibly unprofessional and if he doesn’t feel the same way, I could get fired two days in.” I turn, looking out the window. “That probably doesn’t look good on resumes.”

Bucky shakes his head, smiling. “You don’t understand, none of this is professional. Steve really likes you, Y/N, and we need to do something about it.”

“We? What do you mean we?”

“Steve has a jealousy thing,” Bucky says as he paces back and forth. “He gets super protective; I would know, I’ve seen it.”

I sit down on Bucky’s bed, placing my hands on my knees, looking up at him. “Fine, Buck, let’s say Steve actually does have a thing for me. If we’re going by your plan, we would have to find a guy in the compound who would want to go out with me, but not for real.”

A smile forms on Bucky’s face. “What about me, doll?” he asks, sitting down next to me on the bed. “I already know the plan, in fact it was my plan, and you could do so much worse.”

I look up to see Bucky smiling at me, waiting for a response. I think for a moment, but then roll my eyes. “Fine, for Steve, I’ll fake date you,” I mumble, looking away.

“That’s the spirit!” Bucky says excitedly, smiling as he stands up. “There’s worse people you could fake date, you’ve got to give me that.”

Permanent tag list: @forreyaljanya @bva14 @sofipatey @whystopkeepon @shliic @frost-11 @ineedhelpmovingtobostonmatoteach @youreahandsomedevil @myersge @raeology

Capsizing Pt 3 ❤️💙

Summary: You are hired to be Steve’s new assistant at the new Avengers facility. As you get to know the super soldier, Bucky points out your obvious crush on Steve and helps him admit his as well.

Pairings: Steve x Reader, Bucky x Reader (fake) later on

Warnings: fluff, just a bit of language, Steve being a teasing little shit

Word count: 523 words

A/N: i am so incredibly sorry this was so late!! I’m going to try to be quicker with updates ❤️ pt 4??

•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

“And here we have the pool. That concludes our tour of the compound, any questions?” I look up at a smiling Steve, still in his workout clothes.

“That’ll be it, thanks for the tour. Now I won’t get too lost,” I say, smiling. I quickly check my watch. Noticing it says 7:00, I bid Steve goodbye and walk to the elevator.

The elevator arrives at floor 1, and I walk down the hall into the kitchen. Vision and Wanda Maximoff are casually talking at the table, and Bucky is leaning on the counter drinking coffee. He looks up, and I walk to him. “You’re early. I love it,” he says, not too loud. “Why don’t we go to my room, it will be a little more private.” I nod, and follow him back the elevator.

We reach floor 3, and I run a little to keep up with Bucky’s long strides. He opens his room, and holds the door open for me as I walk inside. I look around the large room, noticing how different it is from Steve’s. Both are spacious and huge, but Steve’s looked smaller because of all the clutter around the room. “So, you like Steve?”

I look up quickly at Bucky, who is smirking from across the room at me. “We’ve already established that, yes,” I mutter, my cheeks turning bright red immediately. “Why do you care so much?”

“Because from the way that man was looking at you, he’s probably feeling the same way,” Bucky says, chuckling lightly as he sits on his bed.

My eyes widen immediately, but I quickly come to my senses and shake my head. “I can’t. He can’t, I work for him. That’s incredibly unprofessional and if he doesn’t feel the same way, I could get fired two days in.” I turn, looking out the window. “That probably doesn’t look good on resumes.”

Bucky shakes his head, smiling. “You don’t understand, none of this is professional. Steve really likes you, Y/N, and we need to do something about it.”

“We? What do you mean we?”

“Steve has a jealousy thing,” Bucky says as he paces back and forth. “He gets super protective; I would know, I’ve seen it.”

I sit down on Bucky’s bed, placing my hands on my knees, looking up at him. “Fine, Buck, let’s say Steve actually does have a thing for me. If we’re going by your plan, we would have to find a guy in the compound who would want to go out with me, but not for real.”

A smile forms on Bucky’s face. “What about me, doll?” he asks, sitting down next to me on the bed. “I already know the plan, in fact it was my plan, and you could do so much worse.”

I look up to see Bucky smiling at me, waiting for a response. I think for a moment, but then roll my eyes. “Fine, for Steve, I’ll fake date you,” I mumble, looking away.

“That’s the spirit!” Bucky says excitedly, smiling as he stands up. “There’s worse people you could fake date, you’ve got to give me that.”

Permanent tag list: @forreyaljanya @bva14 @sofipatey @whystopkeepon @shliic @frost-11 @ineedhelpmovingtobostonmatoteach @youreahandsomedevil @myersge @raeology

summary:
Thor x Pregnant!Reader
Summary: The second trimester of your pregnancy 
A/N: Sorry this is a bit shit. 
Part 1
Mornings aren't...
body:
A Royal Pregnancy (2/3)

Thor x Pregnant!Reader

Summary: The second trimester of your pregnancy

A/N: Sorry this is a bit shit.

Part 1

Mornings aren’t that bad anymore since you no longer wake up needing to throw up. Instead you wake up feeling normal. You’re now four months along and your baby bump is starting to show a little. Your feeling really proud like a true mom to be. It was towards the end of the month when you felt the baby move for the first time. It slightly scared you at first because you were sitting on the couch with Thor watching The Lion King on tv when you felt the baby move.

As month five begins you were glowing as some people would say. You’re also showing more of a bump which you were excited about.Thor would nearly always have a hand on your bump. Whether you were in the kitchen and he’d wrap his arm around your waist or you could just be sitting on the couch and he would have his arm around you with his hand resting on your bump. You were mostly excited this month because you could find out the gender of the baby. When you had your prenatal visit you found out that you were going to have a baby girl. You both felt thrilled. You even got to take a picture home with you and to show the rest of the avengers.

Month six now and you feel tired pretty much all the time. Your back and feet are a little sore but Thor is always there to help and make sure you’re ok. When you’re sleeping Thor would have his arm wrapped gently around your bump. His protectivness would increase and he would still talk to the baby a lot even though she can’t hear yet. You can feel her a little bit more now when she moves or hiccups. Your legs often start to cramp up but your still happy and besides you have Thor to help with anything, plus you’re the Queen of Asgard so no doubt you’d get the royal treatment anyway.

Part 3

Tags: @banner-and-bucky-are-life @disneyfreakbitch5 @odinson-barnes @welcome-to-my-daydreams

summary: Does anyone else go on tumblr to look at a tag or a post, but then you see one post you like on your dashboard and next thing...
body: Does anyone else go on tumblr to look at a tag or a post, but then you see one post you like on your dashboard and next thing you know you’re two hours in and still haven’t gotten to the thing you were supposed to be here for in the first place because you’re constantly being distracted by good posts.

I don't have a muse or an official RP blog but what I DO have is a character bio for my KH OC Alona which can be read here: https://m.fanfiction.net/u/2121111/?a=b If you want to know anything else about me just ask.
